prompt: For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:hasDocumentType property must be a single string value, which is one of the following: "Commercial invoice", "Credit advice", "Value credit", "Value debit", "Handelsrechnung", "Gutschriftsanzeige", "Wertgutschrift", or "Wertbelastung". If this property is missing or invalid, display: "Data element 1001 is missing in the BGM segment".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:hasDocumentNumber property must be a single string value, and a validation error with the message "Data element 1004 is missing in the BGM segment" will occur if this value is missing.

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:hasDocumentNumber property must be a single string value with a maximum length of 12 characters; if it does, "The data element 1004 in the BGM segment is too long" will be reported.

For edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:hasDocumentFunction property must be a string with exactly one value from the list {"Cancellation", "Replacement", "Duplicate", "Original", "Copy", "Additional transfer", "Stornierung", "Ersatz", "Duplikat", "Original", "Kopie", "Zusaetzliche Uebertragung"}. If this property is missing or invalid, display: "Data element 1225 is missing in the BGM segment, i.e. the specification of the document function".
For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:documentDate property must be a single string value, otherwise, an error will be displayed with the message "The DTM+137 segment is missing".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the p2p-o-inv:actualDeliveryDate property must be a single string value, and it is required; if this property is not provided or is invalid, display the error message "The DTM+35 segment is missing".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:orderNumberSupplier property must be a single string value, otherwise, show the error message "The supplier's order number, RFF+VN, is missing from the header".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the property edifact-o:orderNumberSupplier must be a string with a maximum length of 35 characters; exactly one value is allowed; if it exceeds 35 characters, show: "The order number of the supplier, RFF+VN, in the header is too long".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:dateOrderNumberSupplier property must be a single string value, otherwise, show the error message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+VN, is missing from the header"".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:dateOrderNumberSupplier property must be a single string value with a maximum length of 8 characters; if it does, show the error message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+VN, in the header is too long".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:orderNumberBuyer property must be a single string value, otherwise, the error message "The supplier's order number, RFF+ON, is missing from the header" will be displayed.

In instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:orderNumberBuyer property must exactly have one value which is a string with a maximum length of 35 characters; if it exceeds 35 characters, show: "The order number of the supplier, RFF+ON, in the header is too long".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:dateOrderNumberBuyer property must be a single string value, and it is mandatory to provide this value; if it is missing or invalid, show the error message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+ON, is missing from the header".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:dateOrderNumberBuyer property must be a single string value with a maximum length of 8 characters; if not, display the error message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+ON, in the header is too long".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:deliveryNoteNumber property must be a single string value; otherwise, an error will occur with the message "The supplier's order number, RFF+DQ, is missing".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:deliveryNoteNumber property must exist and be a string value having a maximum of 35 characters; if it exceeds 35 characters, display the error message "The supplier's order number, RFF+DQ, is too long".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:dateDeliveryNoteNumber property must be a single string value, and it is mandatory; if this property is missing or invalid, display: "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+DQ, is missing".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:dateDeliveryNoteNumber property must be a string with a maximum length of 8 characters; absence of this property is allowed. If the length exceeds 8 characters, show: "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+DQ, is too long".
For instances of edifact-o:E-Invoice, the property p2p-o-inv:hasBuyer must have exactly one value; if this property is missing, an error will occur with the message "The NAD+BY segment is missing".

For org:FormalOrganization instances, if they have rdf:type "http://example.com/BuyerRole", then no p2p-o-org:VATIdentifier is required; otherwise, they must have exactly one p2p-o-org:VATIdentifier property, which is a string with a maximum length of 14 characters, and if not provided, display: "The Segment RFF+VA is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. the buyer's VAT number is missing".

For org:FormalOrganization instances that are not of rdf:type "http://example.com/BuyerRole", the p2p-o-org:formalName property must be a string with a length between 1 and 35 characters, and exactly one value, otherwise display: "The data element 3036 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. specification of the formal names of the buyer".

For an org:FormalOrganization, if it's not of rdf:type "http://example.com/BuyerRole", then it must have exactly one p2p-org:globalLocationNumber property, which is an integer with exactly 13 digits; otherwise, display: "Data element 3039 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. specification of the GLN of the buyer."

For org:FormalOrganization, unless it has rdf:type "http://example.com/BuyerRole", it must have exactly one edifact-o:hasCity property with a string value of maximum 35 characters; otherwise, display "The data element 3164 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. specification of the buyer's city".

For org:FormalOrganization instances, either the rdf:type must be "http://example.com/BuyerRole" or they must have exactly one frapo:hasCountryCode property with a string value of maximum 3 characters; otherwise, the error message "The data element 3207 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. indication of the country of the buyer" will be shown.

For an org:FormalOrganization, if it is not of rdf:type "http://example.com/BuyerRole", then it must have exactly one vcard:hasStreetAddress property with a string value of maximum length 35; otherwise, show: "The data element 3042 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. the buyer's street address."

If an org:FormalOrganization is not of rdf:type "http://example.com/BuyerRole", then it has no constraint, but if it is, then it must have exactly one vcard:postalCode property, which is a string with a maximum length of 9, and absence of this data is indicated by the message "The data element 3251 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. specification of the buyer's postal code".
For instances of edifact-o:E-Invoice, the p2p-o-inv:hasSupplier property is required to exist with exactly one value, and if not, display the error message "The NAD+SU segment is missing".

Here is the improved translation:

For each org:FormalOrganization, if it is not of rdf:type "http://example.com/SupplierRole", then it must have exactly one p2p-o-org:VATIdentifier property with a string value of maximum 14 characters. Otherwise, the system will display the error message "The Segment RFF+VA is missing for the Segment NAD+SU, i.e. Angabe of the VAT number of the supplier".

For org:FormalOrganization instances, if they are not of rdf:type "http://example.com/SupplierRole", they must have exactly one p2p-o-org:formalName property with a string value of maximum 35 characters; otherwise, the validation will fail with the message "The data element 3036 is missing for the Segment NAD+SU, i.e. specification of the formal name of the supplier".

For instances of org:FormalOrganization, if it is not of rdf:type "http://example.com/SupplierRole", then the p2p-o-org:globalLocationNumber property must exist exactly once, its value must be an integer with exactly 13 digits, and if this condition is not met, show: "The data element 3039 is missing for the Segment NAD+SU, i.e. specification of the GLN of the supplier".

For instances of org:FormalOrganization, if the rdf:type is not "http://example.com/SupplierRole", then the edifact-o:hasCity property must have exactly one string value with a maximum length of 35 characters; otherwise, show the error message "The data element 3164 is missing for the Segment NAD+SU, i.e. specification of the city of the supplier".

For instances of org:FormalOrganization, if the rdf:type is not "http://example.com/SupplierRole", the frapo:hasCountryCode property must have exactly one string with a maximum length of 3 characters; otherwise, display "Data element 3207 is missing for the Segment NAD+SU, i.e. specification of the supplier's country".

If an org:FormalOrganization is not of rdf:type "http://example.com/SupplierRole", it must have exactly one vcard:hasStreetAddress property with a string value of maximum length 35; otherwise, show: "The data element 3042 is missing for the Segment NAD+SU, i.e. specification of the supplier's street".

For org:FormalOrganization instances, if they are not of type "http://example.com/SupplierRole", then they must have exactly one vcard:postalCode property with a string value of maximum 9 characters; otherwise, an error will occur with the message "The data element 3251 is missing for the Segment NAD+SU, i.e. the supplier's postal code".

For instances of edifact-o:E-Invoice, the property edifact-o:hasInvoicee must have exactly one value; if this property is missing or invalid, display the error message "The NAD+IV segment is missing".

If an org:FormalOrganization is of rdf:type "http://example.com/InvoiceeRole", it must have exactly one p2p-o-org:VATIdentifier property, which is a string with a maximum length of 14 characters; otherwise, the error message "The segment RFF+VA is missing for the segment NAD+IV, i.e. the VAT number of the invoice recipient is missing." will be displayed.

For instances of org:FormalOrganization, if not of rdf:type "http://example.com/InvoiceeRole", the p2p-o-org:formalName property must be a single string value, having a maximum length of 35 characters; otherwise, display "Data element 3036 is missing for Segment NAD+IV, i.e. specification of the formal name of the invoice recipient".

For instances of org:FormalOrganization, they must either have an rdf:type of "http://example.com/InvoiceeRole" or have exactly one p2p-o-org:globalLocationNumber property with a value that is an integer of exactly 13 digits in length; otherwise, display "The data element 3039 is missing for the Segment NAD+IV, i.e. specification of the GLN of the invoice recipient".

For org:FormalOrganization instances, if they are not of type "http://example.com/InvoiceeRole", then they must have exactly one edifact-o:hasCity property with a string value no longer than 35 characters; otherwise, display the error message "The data element 3164 is missing for the Segment NAD+IV, i.e. the specification of the city of the invoice recipient".

For org:FormalOrganization instances, they must have a frapo:hasCountryCode property with exactly one string value, maximum length 3, unless they are of rdf:type "http://example.com/InvoiceeRole", otherwise the error message "Data element 3207 is missing for Segment NAD+IV, i.e. specification of the country of the invoice recipient" will be shown.

For org:FormalOrganization instances, if they are not of type http://example.com/InvoiceeRole, they must have exactly one vcard:hasStreetAddress property with a string value of no more than 35 characters; otherwise, display "Data element 3042 is missing for Segment NAD+IV, i.e. specification of the invoice recipient's street address".

For org:FormalOrganization instances, if they do not have rdf:type "http://example.com/InvoiceeRole", then they must have exactly one vcard:postalCode with a string value of exactly 1 to 9 characters; otherwise, display the error message "The data element 3251 is missing for the Segment NAD+IV, i.e. specification of the postal code of the invoice recipient".
For instances of edifact-o:E-Invoice, the edifact-o:hasDeliveryParty property must have exactly one value; otherwise, display the error message "The NAD+PR segment is missing".

For an org:FormalOrganization, if it has rdf:type "http://example.com/DeliveryPartyRole", then it must not have a p2p-o-org:VATIdentifier property, otherwise, it must have exactly one p2p-o-org:VATIdentifier property with a string value between 1 and 14 characters; failure to meet this condition will display "The Segment RFF+VA is missing for the Segment NAD+DP, i.e. the VAT number of the delivery address is missing."

For instances of org:FormalOrganization, the p2p-o-org:formalName property must be a string with exactly one value, having a maximum length of 35 characters; if this property is missing or invalid, display: "The data element 3036 is missing for the Segment NAD+DP, i.e. specification of the formal name of the delivery address".

For org:FormalOrganization instances, unless they are of rdf:type "http://example.com/DeliveryPartyRole", the p2p-o-org:globalLocationNumber property must exist exactly once and have a value that is an integer of exactly 13 digits, otherwise, show: "The data element 3039 is missing for the Segment NAD+DP, i.e. specification of the GLN of the delivery address".

For org:FormalOrganization instances, if they are not of type "http://example.com/DeliveryPartyRole", then they must have exactly one edifact-o:hasCity property with a string value of maximum 35 characters; otherwise, report an error with the message "The data element 3164 is missing for the Segment NAD+DP, i.e. specification of the city of the delivery address".

For instances of org:FormalOrganization, if the rdf:type is not "http://example.com/DeliveryPartyRole", then the frapo:hasCountryCode property must be a single string value with a maximum length of 3 characters; otherwise, display the error message "Data element 3207 is missing for the Segment NAD+DP, i.e. specification of the country of the delivery address".

For instances of org:FormalOrganization, if they are not of rdf:type "http://example.com/DeliveryPartyRole", the vcard:hasStreetAddress property must be a string with exactly one value, a maximum length of 35 characters, and it must be present; otherwise, display the error message "The data element 3042 is missing for the Segment NAD+DP, i.e. specification of the street of the delivery address".

For org:FormalOrganization, it must have exactly one vcard:postalCode property with a string value of maximum 9 characters), unless it is of rdf:type "http://example.com/DeliveryPartyRole", otherwise, the error message "The data element is missing for the Segment NAD+DP, i.e. specification of the postal code of the delivery address" will be shown.

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the schema1:currency property must be a string with exactly one value; if it is missing or invalid, show the error message "The CUX segment in the invoice header is missing".

For instances of edifact-o:item, either the edifact-o:hasProductIdentification property must have at least one string value equal to "International Article Number" or the edifact-o:itemNumberSupplier property must have at least one string value; if neither condition is met, display: "The LIN segment with the value EN in data element 7143 is missing, i.e. the specification of the EAN article number or the PIA segment with the value SA in data element 7143 is missing, i.e. the specification of the supplier's article number.

For instances of edifact-o:item, the property edifact-o:deliveredQuantity must be specified exactly once with a value that is a floating-point number with a maximum of 15 digits; if this property is missing or invalid, show "The segment QTY+12 is missing, i.e. the specification of the calculated quantity."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the p2p-o-doc-line:invoicedQuantity property must be a float value with exactly one occurrence, a maximum length of 15 characters, and is mandatory; if it is missing or invalid, show the error message "The segment QTY+47 is missing, i.e. the specification of the calculated quantity."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasLineItemAmount property must be a float with exactly one value, a maximum of 14 digits, and is required; if it is missing or invalid, display: "The segment MOA+203 is missing, i.e. the indication of the net position price."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasNetpriceOfItem property must be a float with exactly one value, a maximum length of 13 characters, and is mandatory, otherwise, show: "The PRI+AAA segment is missing, i.e. the indication of the net price of an individual article."

For edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasGrosspriceOfItem property must be a float with exactly one value, a maximum length of 13 characters, and is mandatory; if this property is missing or invalid, display: "The PRI+AAB segment is missing, i.e. the indication of the net price of an individual article."
For instances, the edifact-o:orderNumberSupplier property must have exactly one value; otherwise, display the message "The order number of the supplier, RFF+VN, is missing".

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:orderNumberSupplier property must be a string with exactly one value; if it is missing or invalid, show: "The order number of the supplier, RFF+VN, is missing in the item part."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:orderNumberSupplier property must be a single string value with a maximum length of 35 characters; if it exceeds 35 characters, show: "The order number of the supplier, RFF+VN, in the item part is too long."

For instances of class edifact-o:item, the property edifact-o:dateOrderNumberSupplier must have exactly one string value; if it is missing or invalid, display: "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+VN, is missing in the item part."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:dateOrderNumberSupplier property must be a string with a minimum length of 1 and a maximum length of 8 characters; if not, show: "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+VN, in the item section must be long enough."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:orderNumberBuyer property must be a single string value, and it is mandatory; if it is invalid or absent, display: "The order number of the supplier, RFF+ON, is missing in the item part."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:orderNumberBuyer property must be a single string value with a maximum length of 35 characters; if it exceeds 35 characters, show: "The order number of the supplier, RFF+ON, in the item part is too long."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:dateOrderNumberBuyer property must be a single string value; otherwise, an error will occur with the message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+ON, is missing in the item part."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:dateOrderNumberBuyer property must be a single string value with a maximum length of 8 characters, otherwise, show the error message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+ON, in the item part is too long."

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:hasInvoiceAmount property must be a single string value, exactly one occurrence, with a maximum length of 14 characters; if it does not meet these constraints, display the message "The segment MOA+77 is missing, i.e. the invoice amount is missing."

In an edifact-o:InvoiceDetails instance, exactly one value for the edifact-o:hasTotalLineItemAmount property is required, otherwise, the error message "The segment MOA+79 is missing, i.e. the indication of the total position amount." will be shown.

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, exactly one value for the edifact-o:hasTotalAdditionsAndDeductions property is required; if it is missing or invalid, display the error message "The segment MOA+131 is missing, i.e. the indication of the sums of the additions/deductions."

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:hasTaxableAmount property must be present with exactly one value, otherwise display "The segment MOA+125 is missing, i.e. the indication of the taxable amount."

For instances of org:FormalOrganization, the edifact-o:additionalPartnerIdentificationEANCode property must be a string with a maximum length of 35 characters and exactly one value, otherwise the error message "The RFF+API segment is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the additional partner identification." is displayed.

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:paymentCondition property must be a string with a maximum of 5 occurrences, each value being one of the following: "As usual", "Extended", "Wie üblich", "Verlængert"; if the specified payment term does not meet these conditions, display "The specified payment term is not one of the expected values, i.e. data element 4279 in the PAT segment is not equal to 1 or 7."

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:valutaDate property must be a single string value not exceeding 8 characters; if it does, display "The specified value date is too long, i.e. the DTM+209.""

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasAllowanceReason property must be a string with a minimum length of 1 character and a maximum of 15 occurrences, specifying multiple allowance reasons; if the data element 7160 or 7161 is missing in the ALC segment, show the error: "The data element 7160 or 7161 is missing in the ALC segment, i.e. the tee type specification."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasDiscountReason property must be a string with a minimum length of 1 and a maximum of 15 occurrences. If this property is missing or invalid, show: "The data element 7160 or 7161 is missing in the ALC segment, i.e. the tee type specification."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasChargeReason property must be a string with a minimum length of 1 character and a maximum of 15 occurrences, with a constraint message "The data element 7160 or 7161 is missing in the ALC segment, i.e. the specification surcharge type."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasAllowancePercentage property must be a float value with a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 5 characters, and have at most 15 occurrences. If it does not meet these conditions or is missing, show: "The data element 5245 or 5482 is missing in the PCD segment, i.e. the percentage type and amount of the discount".

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasDiscountPercentage property must be a float with a minimum length of 1 character and a maximum length of 5 characters, and must have between 1 and 15 values; if it does not meet these constraints, display: "The data element 5245 or 5482 is missing in the PCD segment, i.e. the percentage type and amount of the discount."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasChargePercentage property must be a float value between 1 and 5 characters long, with a maximum of 15 occurrences. If this constraint is not satisfied, the error message is: "The data element 5245 or 5482 is missing in the PCD segment, i.e. the percentage type and amount of the surcharge."

Here is the rewritten natural language sentence:

For every instance of edifact-o:item, exactly one or two values are allowed for either p2p-o-inv:hasAllowanceAmount or edifact-o:hasDiscountAmount, and each value must be a string with a maximum length of 13 characters; if this constraint is not met, "The segment MOA+8, MOA+23 or MOA+204 is incorrect, i.e. the indication of the gross final amount of the invoice."

For each instance of class edifact-o:item, the property edifact-o:hasVATrate must be a string with a maximum length of 5 characters, and it may appear between 1 and 5 times; if this property is invalid or exceeds the specified limits, show the error message "The TAX segment at item level is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the tax rate; TAX; SG 21; header part; is incorrect."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the p2p-o-item:itemName property must be a string with exactly one value; otherwise, display the error message: "The data element 7008 in the IMD segment is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the article name."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasTaxAmount property must be a single string with a length of 13 characters, otherwise, the error message "The segment MOA+124 is incorrect, i.e. the tax amount is not specified." will be displayed.

For instances of edifact-o:item, exactly one of the p2p-o-inv:hasAllowanceAmount property (a string with a maximum length of 18 characters and up to 2 values) or the edifact-o:hasDiscountAmount property (a string with a maximum length of 18 characters and up to 2 values) must be present; otherwise, display "The segment MOA+23 or MOA+204 is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the surcharge or discount amount is incorrect."

For instances of edifact-o:item, the edifact-o:hasAdditionDeductionBasis property must be a single string value with a maximum length of 13 characters; otherwise, an error message will be displayed: "The MOA+25 segment is incorrect, i.e. the base amount of the surcharge or discount is incorrect."

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:hasVATrate property must have between 1 and 5 values, each being a string with a maximum of 5 characters; otherwise, error message: "The TAX segment at totals level is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the tax rate".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the edifact-o:hasTaxAmount property must be a single string value with a maximum length of 13 characters; otherwise, an error will be raised with the message "The segment MOA+124 is incorrect, i.e. the tax amount is not specified."
For instances of edifact-o:E-Invoice, the edifact-o:belongsToProcess property must have exactly one value, which must be "ProcessExample".

For instances of edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, the value of edifact-o:hasTotalLineItemAmount must be equal to the sum of all values of edifact-o:hasLineItemAmount; if not, report "edifact-o:hasTotalLineItemAmount must equal the sum of all values of edifact-o:hasLineItemAmount".
